text: Camillo Magni was an Italian architect. Camillo Magni is an archistar among the protagonists of the birth of Italian design active in the fifties. Camillo Magni es una archistar entre los protagonistas del nacimiento del diseño italiano activo en los años cincuenta. == Birth == Camillo Magni's best known masterpiece is the building in viale Beatrice d’Este 16 built in the exclusive Quadronno district of Milan, in 1957, in collaboration with Giordano Forti.Camillo MAGNI; Edificio residenziale, Ordine Architetti ==Works== * 1957, viale Beatrice d’Este 16, MilanoCamillo Magni Beni Culturali ==References== == Bibliography == * Agnoldomenico Pica, Architettura moderna in Milano, 1964 == Other websites == * Camillo MAGNI; Edificio residenziale, Ordine Architetti * Camillo Magni Beni Culturali Category:Italian designers Category:1924 births
title: Camillo Magni
